title: GOLD!

replies.body: This what happens when you watch only corkis stream, you gain elo. the evidence is just not debatable.
ahh too late mate no rewards for you!
Wow there's a picture to your name
its ok :) least i did it thats what matters to me, makes me know i can do it next season :)
blah, i wont be here in gold long lol, 4 losses in a row :( {{champion:53}}  is failing meeee

winning as support is pretty effortless, git gud,



jks grats bae <3
Nek Minnit, demoted to Bronze preseason due to lack of MMR.

Congratulations! great work on achieving gold.

Wards for the Win {{item:2044}} {{item:2043}}
